title: El Escorial
knownFor: Massive royal monastery and palace complex built by Philip II. Impressive Renaissance architecture housing royal tombs, a basilica, library, and art collection. UNESCO World Heritage Site.
howToGetThere: Bus 661 or 664 from Moncloa interchange (50-55 min, every 15 min). Train from Chamart√≠n also available but bus is more convenient.
